code: import{Button}from"@material-tailwind/react";import{useContext,useEffect}from"react";import{Navigate,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{AuthContext}from"../../context/AuthContext";import toast,{Toaster}from"react-hot-toast";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const{checkLogin}=useContext(AuthContext);useEffect(()=>{checkLogin();},[]);const Logout=()=>{toast.success("Logout Successful!");localStorage.clear();navigate("/login");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-evenly  mt-8",children:["Hello User",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"blue",onClick:Logout,children:"Logout"})]});};export default Dashboard;
